version.description: If this sample config is updated in a non-breaking way the minor version should be increased, if a breaking change is introduced (a rename, a new section, etc) then the major version should be increased and the minor version should be reset.

bloatwareremoval.details: This is an experimental new feature, proceed with caution

bloatware.description: Microsoft Teams is a team collaboration application developed by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft 365 family of products, offering workspace chat and video conferencing, file storage, and integration of proprietary and third-party applications and services

Clipchamp is an online video editing tool developed by Australian company Clipchamp Pty Ltd., which is now a subsidiary of Microsoft. It is non-linear editing software that allows users to import, edit, and export audiovisual material in an Internet browser window
OneDrive is a cloud storage service from Microsoft that lets you back up, access, edit, share, and sync your files from any device

regedit.description: Set Windows Explorer to show hidden files and folders
Set Windows Explorer to show file extensions
Disable web search in the start menu
Enable Update Console Lock Display off timeout

powersettings.details: If running for the first time, current power settings will be backed up to local config directory
If power settings backup already exists in local config directory it will be imported and set as current power settings

backblazeclean.details: This section adds lines to the Backblaze config file C:\ProgramData\Backblaze\bzdata\bzinfo.xml

dir.notes: The $SysReset folder is created when a Refresh or Reset operation fails. It contains a log folder that may be useful to system administrators experiencing a problem with refreshing or resetting a PC

The Config.Msi folder is used by the Windows Installer process during an installation of software. It saves files with the extension of .RBS and .RBF. These are Rollback Script Files used by the installer to uninstall recent changes if an install fails somewhere along the way
This directory can easily be over 10 GB

setwallpaper.details: This section sets the desktop wallpaper to an existing image in the local config wallpapers directory

app.description: Intel Extreme Tuning Utility (Intel XTU) is used to overclock, monitor, and stress a system
Samsung Magician - Manage your drive like magic
Discord is an instant messaging and VoIP social platform which allows communication through voice calls, video calls, text messaging, and media
Git is a distributed version control system that tracks versions of files
The ultimate GUI Git client for streamlining and enhancing your local code management process
Chrome is the official web browser from Google, built to be fast, secure, and customizable
Visual Studio Code, also commonly referred to as VS Code, is an integrated development environment developed by Microsoft for Windows, Linux, macOS and web browsers
Mozilla Firefox is a free and open source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation
Slack is a cloud-based team communication platform developed by Slack Technologies
LibreOffice is a free and open-source office productivity software suite, a project of The Document Foundation

visualstudio.details: If savesnapshots is set True then current installation details will be saved to my.vsconfig file in local config directory during scheduled auto backup (requires Schedule Auto Backup of Settings to be enabled)
If installfromsnapshot is set True then workload selections below will be ignored and installation preferences will be based off my.vsconfig snapshot

app.description: Visual Studio is an integrated development environment (IDE) developed by Microsoft. It is used to develop computer programs including websites, web apps, web services and mobile apps

workload.name: Azure development
workload.description: Azure SDKs, tools, and projects for developing cloud apps and creating resources using .NET and .NET Framework. Also includes tools for containerizing your application, including Docker support

workload.name: Data storage and processing
workload.description: Connect, develop, and test data solutions with SQL Server, Azure Data Lake, or Hadoop

workload.name: Data science and analytical applications
workload.description: Languages and tooling for creating data science applications, including Python and F#

workload.name: .NET desktop development
workload.description: Build WPF, Windows Forms, and console applications using C#, Visual Basic, and F# with .NET and .NET Framework

workload.name: Game development with Unity
workload.description: Create 2D and 3D games with Unity, a powerful cross-platform development environment

workload.name: Linux and embedded development with C++
workload.description: Create and debug applications running in a Linux environment or on an embedded device

workload.name: Desktop development with C++
workload.description: Build modern C++ apps for Windows using tools of your choice, including MSVC, Clang, CMake, or MSBuild

workload.name: Game development with C++
workload.description: Use the full power of C++ to build professional games powered by DirectX, Unreal, or Cocos2d

workload.name: Mobile development with C++
workload.description: Build cross-platform applications for iOS, Android or Windows using C++

workload.name: .NET Multi-platform App UI development
workload.description: Build Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac apps from a single codebase using C# with .NET MAUI

workload.name: ASP.NET and web development
workload.description: Build web applications using ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET, HTML/JavaScript, and Containers including Docker support

workload.name: Node.js development
workload.description: Build scalable network applications using Node.js, an asynchronous event-driven JavaScript runtime

workload.name: Office/SharePoint development
workload.description: Create Office and SharePoint add-ins, SharePoint solutions, and VSTO add-ins using C#, VB, and JavaScript

workload.name: Python development
workload.description: Editing, debugging, interactive development and source control for Python

workload.name: Windows application development
workload.description: Build applications for the Windows platform using WinUI with C# or optionally C++

workload.name: Visual Studio extension development
workload.description: Create add-ons and extensions for Visual Studio, including new commands, code analyzers and tool windows

setchromedefaultbrowser.details: Sets Google Chrome as the default browser for Windows

backup.description: DBeaver stores connection settings in this file, not passwords though
Windows Terminal stores its profiles in this settings file

dir.description: Custom location for storing shortcuts instead of the desktop
User specific location for shortcuts that are used in the Start Menu
Global location for shortcuts that are used in the Start Menu
